Pick random KMERs from KMC3 database. The choice is among KMERs within a frequency range

Source: R/count_kmer.R
ChooseInformativeKMERs.Rd

Pick random KMERs from KMC3 database. The choice is among KMERs within a frequency range

Usage

ChooseInformativeKMERs(kmer_hist, minfreq = 0.005, maxfreq = 1)

Arguments

minfreq

description

maxfreq

description

fname

description

num_pick

description

Value

List of KMERs
